item_hpt:
[Dark mode doesn't stay enabled after closing your browser](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/1n55/dark-mode-doesnt-stay-enabled-after)

https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/1n55/dark-mode-doesnt-stay-enabled-after

It doesn't seem to save as a setting, which means every time you go on ruqqus you have to re-enable it again.
